deposit(address).details: Deposit GXC to `UnstakePool`, only can be called by stake manager,     this will be called when user starts unstake.

slash(address,uint8).details: Slash validator and transfer the slashed amount to `address(0)`.

withdraw(address,uint256,address).details: Withdraw GXC and burn shares, only can be called by stake manager,     this will be called when unstake timeout.

params.to: GXC receiver address(this value is set when the user starts unstake).
